name: DreamCatcher (itch) (Matt Cioni)
description:
Dreamcatchers is a fast paced survival  based game where you the player control a dreamcatcher, and try to fend off the monsters of night until morning. Do you have what it takes to last all week? Only one way to know, take up arms and join the fight. FOR THE DREAMCATCHERS!

-Hover the mouse over monsters to kill them

-Space bar to use power when dreamcatcher in top left appears

survive until dawn and make it through every day

Developed by

Mathew McDowell (Artist)

Matt Cioni (Co-Creator/Audio Master/ Programmer)

Logan White (Co-Creator/Programmer/Artist)
